family.name: Silent Drive decoders
family.comment: These are the version 3.0-3.4 Silent Running decoders

variable.label: Motor drive frequency
variable.comment: 1-255 PWM drive freq in 128us increments; 0 = frequency is 15,625 Hz
variable.tooltip: When set to 0, frequency is 15,625 Hz
variable.label: Motor drive frequency
variable.comment: 1-255 PWM drive freq in 128us increments; 0 = frequency is 15,625 Hz

variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse

Ditch light hold time
variable.tooltip: Value in 1/4 second increments after F2 goes off
variable.label: Ditch light hold time
Lighting Effects Page
variable.tooltip: Must be set to 255 for access to CVs 120-127
variable.label: Lighting Effects Page
